publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2770 Michael Russell: Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal—That the Parliament congratulates the UK Woman’s curling team, their coaches and support staff on their tremendous achievement in winning an Olympic Gold medal and on becoming the first Scots to win Winter Olympic Gold since 1936; admires their professionalism and their generous sportsmanship, and expresses the hope that their example will stimulate renewed interest, official backing and increased investment not just in curling but in other traditional Scottish sports. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Irene McGugan*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Alex Fergusson*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Cathy Peattie*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Pauline McNeill*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2770 Women's Curling Olympic Gold Medal (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
